## CardContainer.removeAll() method

Remove all cards matching a predicate from this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeAll(predicate: {
        (card: TCard): boolean;
    }): TCard[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  predicate | { (card: TCard): boolean; } | Predicate to match for each card. |

**Returns:**

TCard\[\]

The removed cards.
